Feature is OS independent (transparent to OS); OS support is only needed for displaying configuration and monitoring (fixes may be required) Functiona VSEn V6R3 z/TPF V1R1 Linux on IBM Zb Chapter 7. Operating system support 255 7.3.4 Network connectivity The supported network connectivity functions for z/OS and z/VM are listed in Table 7-8. Table 7-8 Supported network connectivity functions for z/OS and z/VM Statements of Directiona:  IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ generation will be the last IBM Z to support the OSE CHPID type.  IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ generation will be the last IBM Z to support OSA Express 1000BASE-T hardware adapters. a. Statements by IBM regarding its plans, directions, and intent are subject to change or withdrawal without notice at the sole discretion of IBM. Note: z/OS V2R2 support ended as of September 2020.
